title: Trick or Treat 2016: Set 1
itunes:title: Trick or Treat 2016: Set 1
description:
A Halloween treat to add a bit of spook to your week. Each Lore “Trick or Treat 2016” episode is a collection of two of my favorite “shorts” in one place. Perfect for a rainy day, a walk in the dark, or a campfire gathering. This episode includes “Peg & Button” and “Behind the Door”.

* * *

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

Loot Crate: Get amazing geek and gamer goods shipped to your house for as little as $20 per month. October’s theme is “Horror”, and comes with goodies from icons of the genre like The Walking Dead, Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street, and more. Visit LootCrate.com/lore to sign up by 9PM Pacific of October 19th to get this amazing—and frightening—crate. Be sure to use the coupon code LORE at check-out.

* * *

Official Lore Website: www.lorepodcast.com

Extra member episodes: www.patreon.com/lorepodcast

Novels by Aaron Mahnke: www.aaronmahnke.com/novels

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Access premium content!: https://www.patreon.com/lorepodcast

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
